steps: SB folds marginals; continue strong or 4bet_oop_24bb for value
If flat and see A72r: BB small_cbet_33; Turn brick: half_pot_50 to commit
SB opens 2.1bb; BB prefers 3bet_oop_12bb over flat
Flop K72r: BB small_cbet_33; Turn Qx range card: half_pot_50 (double_barrel_good)
Covered SB overfolds turns -> tag overfold_exploit
SB opens 2.3bb; BB 3-bets 12bb; SB calls OOP
Flop J96r: SB protect_check_range; BB checks some back
Turn Ace: BB delay_turn half_pot_50; big_bet_75 only with strong equity
